description: CSS file for styling the note manager application, managing themes, layouts, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application, including text alignment, background color, and responsive design.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header of the application, ensuring proper layout and color theme.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the App component, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for the theme toggle feature, including positioning, hover effects, and responsiveness.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframe animation defining the spinning effect for the application logo.
